output:
Lay down your story Lay down the story of mine
Don't let it vanish Don't let it wither and die
From you I flew From you I rise
Don't let it end with empty eyes
Lay down your passion Lay down what made you alive
Lay down what drove you Let me get into your eyes
From you I flew From you I rise
Don't break the chain In good time you'll die
Is it you inside my head? Is it you I feel?
Is it you inside my heart? Is it you I feel here?
Lay down the fire Lay down the hurt inside your eyes
Lay down your purpose Let me see into who I am
Is it you inside my head? Is it you I feel?
Is it you inside my heart? Is it you?
Is it you inside my head? Is it you I feel?
Is it you inside my heart? Is it you?
Is it you under my skin? Is it you I feel?
Is it you inside my smile? Is it you I feel here?
